name: award_distance_400
description: You've traveled the distance of a football field. It sounds impressive.

name: award_distance_1500
description: You've traveled far enough to walk to the top of the Eiffel Tower. If they let you, which they don't. They make you pay for an elevator.

name: award_distance_30k
description: You've traveled far enough to reach the average flying height of a passenger jet. Buckle up!

name: award_distance_70k
description: You've traveled far enough to walk the length of Manhattan. It's a nice day out, really.

name: award_blandwich_1
description: You made yourself a blandwich. Enjoy. Yum.

name: award_hero_sotswich_25
description: You've made 25 Hero SotSwiches. That's good eatin'!

name: award_recharge_50
description: You've recharged 50 items, so you can keep on going, and going, and going...

name: award_repair_20
description: You've repaired 20 pieces of your equipment. Nice work, soldier!

name: award_repair_50
description: You've repaired 50 pieces of your equipment and ladies find you handy.

name: award_wolverine
displayName: What I do Isn't Very Nice

name: award_serumbmod_first
description: You tried your first mutagen! Can you move?

name: award_abmod_1on1
description: You've used a bio-mod on your armor! Hopefully it didn't disintegrate...

name: award_abmod_5on1
description: Wow, that's a lot of bio-mods in your armor. If you survive, let's hit the clubs.

name: award_wbmod_1on1
description: You've used a bio-mod on your weapon! How's the aim?

name: award_wbmod_5on1
description: That's a lot of bio-mods in that weapon. Now hold it sideways when you shoot. That's even cooler.
